short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered talent hunter to discover top talent for your job roles, and convert them into active candidates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scout is an AI-powered sourcing solution that helps Recruitment Agencies and Staffing Companies monetise their existing network of candidates.  

SIX key wins with Scout: 

1) Data clean up: Scout data scanner automatically deduplicates your candidate database, codes up each candidate with relevant tags such as industry, location, skills and seniority, and refreshes candidate data automatically in your ATS. 

2) Talent map: Scout’s data mapper automatically creates a dynamic clickable talent map of your entire candidate database.   

3) Candidate <> Job matching: Scout’s recommendation engine automatically surfaces candidates from your database and sends them to the Consultant working that job.  

4) Unified Inbox: View ALL previous email exchanges between a candidate and your organisation directly on the candidate’s Scout profile page.  

5) Candidate outreach: Scout's built in CRM empowers Consultants to run personalised outreach campaigns over email + InMail.  

6) Chrome Plug-in: Scout’s powerful plug-in automatically cross references candidates you view on LinkedIn and shows you which ones are part of your ATS. You can push a new profile back to your ATS with one click and can also selectively add people to a project on Scout.   

Scout has a two-way integration in place with the following ATS: 

1) JobAdder 

2) Vincere 

3) RecruitCRM 

4) ZOHO Recruit 

5) Invenias 

6) Bullhorn 

Keen on a demo? Get in touch: sales@getscout.ai
